wikipedia_page.main: Raymond Reginald 'Ray' Bailey (born 16 May 1944) is an English former cricketer and footballer. He was born in Bedford, Bedfordshire, where he was educated and proved himself a sporting all rounder by captaining his school rugby team and playing in goal for the Bedfordshire Schools football team.

response: Raymond Bailey died of a heart attack on April 15, 1980, aged 75, in Irvine, California. His body was cremated and his ashes were scattered at sea.  He was survived by his wife, Gaby Aida George, and was an uncle of actor William Sylvester.
* Raymond Bailey (sportsman) (born 1944), English cricketer and footballer
